text: Ware wa, Isuraeru no shison ni umi o watara se, firuaun to sono gunzei wa, bōgyaku to tekii ni michite kare-ra o tsuiseki shita. Oborejini-sō ni natta toki, kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Watashi wa shinkō itashimasu. Isuraeru no shison ga shinkō suru kare no soto ni,-shin wa arimasen. Watashi wa fukujū, kie suru monodesu
